title: Modern Elegance, Premier Amenities, Floor-To-Ceiling Windows, Balcony!
posting_body: ['Toni Hill', '| The Apartment Resource |', 'show contact info', 'Loring Park / Downtown, Minneapolis, MN', '$1620/month', 'Bedrooms 1   Bathrooms 1', 'Sq Footage 850', 'Parking: $150/Monthly', 'Pet Policy: Dogs & Cats OK', 'Deposit $500', 'Lease Term: 12-18 Months', 'Luxury Apartments Downtown Minneapolis', "Situated among Loring Park's lush walking trails and scenic byway, our apartments are an energetic community of studio, one and two bedroom apartments in Downtown Minneapolis.", 'From the glass-paneled balconies to the two\xa0designer-finish\xa0packages available, each home offers a sophisticated and unique living experience.', "Residents will also enjoy a convenient commute to work, school and area attractions thanks to the community's ideal location near metro transit bus stops, I-394,\xa0I-94\xa0and 35W and Minneapolis' Central Business District.", 'Step Inside', 'Inside, you will discover an impressive selection of interior finishes.', 'The sleek kitchens boast stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.', 'Airy and bright living spaces include plank flooring and brushed aluminum window treatments over the floor-to-ceiling windows, while the bathrooms feature Kohler fixtures and modern subway tiling.', 'Steps from your door, is an array of thoughtfully designed indoor and outdoor amenity spaces, including indoor and outdoor pools and spa areas, sauna and steam rooms and a state-of-the-art fitness center.', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '100% smoke-free environment', 'Bicycle and Resident Storage', 'Bicycle workshop', 'Business center', 'Expansive glass paneled balconies', 'Fire Pits with Lounge Seating', 'GE Stainless Steel Energy Star appliances', 'Granite countertops', 'Green living (LEED Silver Design)', 'Guest Suite for family or friends', 'Hardwood kitchen floor', 'High Speed Internet', 'Indoor dog play room with lounge & dog wash', 'Indoor lap pool and hot tub', 'In-home laundry with full size washer and dryer', 'Media and game rooms', 'Meeting/Study rooms', 'On-site parking garage', 'Open floor plans with floor-to-ceiling windows', 'Outdoor pool and hot tub', 'Outdoor Yoga/Stretch Area', 'Panoramic City Views', 'Sauna and steam rooms', 'Spacious closets, including walk-ins', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Two Finish Packages to chose from', 'YogaFit', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Prices and availability are subject to change.', 'Contact: Toni Hill |  The Apartment Resource |', 'show contact info']
